channel.title: 常用工具 on 激战2 虚空徽记 Beta版 | GuildWars2 VoidPin Beta
channel.description: Recent content in 常用工具 on 激战2 虚空徽记 Beta版 | GuildWars2 VoidPin Beta

item.title: Event Timer 事件时间表
item.description: 如需查看完整的事件时间表，请访问 官方维基事件时间表 或者在游戏聊天窗内输入命令 /wiki et。 .etwrapper { font-size: 14px; color: #333; position: relative; padding-top: 1em; padding-bottom: 2em; } .etwrapper h1 { margin: 0; } .etwrapper h1, .etwrapper h2 { font-size: 2.5em; } .etwrapper h2 { font-size: 1.5em; font-weight: bold; width: 100%; margin: 0.25em 0; color: black; } .etline { position: absolute; height: 100%; border-left: 2px solid red; z-index: 400; top: 0; transition: left 1s ease-in-out; } .

item.title: 激战2 各服务器 每小时击杀数据统计
item.description: Guild Wars 2 WvW Server Kill/Death(KDR) Per Hour by Saber Lily.1960 Open source on https://github.com/acbetter/gw2-kdr Select Time Zone (UTC offset) UTC−12:00, Y UTC−11:00, X UTC−10:00, W UTC−09:30, V† -- UTC−09:00, V UTC−08:00, U (USA Pacific Time) UTC−07:00, T UTC−06:00, S (USA Central Time) UTC−05:00, R (USA Eastern Time) UTC−04:00, Q UTC−03:30, P† -- UTC−03:00, P UTC−02:00, O UTC−01:00, N UTC±00:00, Z UTC+01:00, A (Central European Time) UTC+02:00, B UTC+03:00, C (Russia Moscow Time) UTC+03:30, C† -- UTC+04:00, D UTC+04:30, D† -- UTC+05:00, E UTC+05:30, E† -- UTC+05:45, E* -- UTC+06:00, F UTC+06:30, F† -- UTC+07:00, G UTC+08:00, H (China) UTC+08:45, H* -- UTC+09:00, I (Japan, SouthKorea) UTC+09:30, I† (Australian Central Standard Time) -- UTC+10:00, K UTC+10:30, K† -- UTC+11:00, L UTC+12:00, M UTC+12:45, M* -- UTC+13:00, M† UTC+14:00, M† {{ matchID.
